instruction: How to make spicy buffalo sauce?
output: To make your own spicy buffalo sauce, heat a tablespoon of butter in a pot over medium heat. Once the butter has melted, add a cup of hot sauce, a dash of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of Worcestershire sauce and a dash of cayenne pepper. Stir until all ingredients are well incorporated, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Enjoy!
